attributes.title: Episode 20: Everything Old is New Again
attributes.caption: Everything Old is New Again
attributes.description: Episode 20 introduces the character Doc to the Blood Gulch, and to the Blues.
attributes.display_title: S2:E1 - Episode 20: Everything Old is New Again
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 21: Motion to Adjourn
attributes.caption: Motion to Adjourn
attributes.description: The Blues fend off an attack from the Reds, the Reds fend off themselves.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 22: Red vs Bleu
attributes.caption: Red vs Bleu
attributes.description: The Blues surrender and sacrifice Doc, the Reds sacrifice Grif's self-esteem.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 23: The Joy of Toggling
attributes.caption: The Joy of Toggling
attributes.description: Doc distances himself from Grif, the Blues make a discovery.

attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 24: Sweet Ride
attributes.caption: Sweet Ride
attributes.description: The Blues almost accidentally toggle Sarge to death.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 25: Last Words
attributes.caption: Last Words
attributes.description: Doc makes an impression on Sarge while the Blues try to fix Church's switch.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 26: Nobody Likes You
attributes.caption: Nobody Likes You
attributes.description: When the Reds try to make a deal with the Blues, one solider gets stuck in the middle.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 27: Nine Tenths of the Law
attributes.caption: Nine Tenths of the Law
attributes.description: Donut gets to know the other members of Red Team better, while Church makes a strategic error - listening to Caboose.
attributes.display_title: S2:E8 - Episode 27: Nine Tenths of the Law
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 28: In Stereo Where Available
attributes.caption: In Stereo Where Available
attributes.description: The Blues try to control Lopez, while the Reds set out looking for a little payback.
attributes.display_title: S2:E9 - Episode 28: In Stereo Where Available
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 28.5: The Last Episode Ever
attributes.caption: The Last Episode Ever
attributes.description: In the series finale of Red vs. Blue, Grif and Donut mourn their loss.
attributes.display_title: S2:E10 - Episode 28.5: The Last Episode Ever
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 29: Radar Love
attributes.caption: Radar Love
attributes.description: Sparks fly when Lopez and Sheila meet, but the unexpected return of a former ally changes everything.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 30: I Dream of Meanie
attributes.caption: I Dream of Meanie
attributes.description: Tex tries to explain her mysterious return, while Sarge looks for a volunteer for a special project.
attributes.display_title: S2:E12 - Episode 30: I Dream of Meanie
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 31: Room For Rent
attributes.caption: Room For Rent
attributes.description: Church and Tex venture into Caboose's mind to search for O'Malley.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 32: Me, Myself and You
attributes.caption: Me, Myself and You
attributes.description: Church and Tex continue their search while Tucker, Sheila and Lopez approach Red Base.
attributes.display_title: S2:E14 - Episode 32: Me, Myself and You
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 33: An Audience of Dumb
attributes.caption: An Audience of Dumb
attributes.description: Lopez serenades the Red Team to get them to shut off their radios and O'Malley infects Doc.
attributes.display_title: S2:E15 - Episode 33: An Audience of Dumb
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 34: Aftermath, Before Biology
attributes.caption: Aftermath, Before Biology
attributes.description: Doc discovers a strange vehicle and Grif has an operation.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 35: What's Mine is Yours
attributes.caption: What's Mine is Yours
attributes.description: Simmons and Grif bicker over surgery while Sarge discloses that Lopez is hiding secret plans.
attributes.display_title: S2:E17 - Episode 35: What's Mine is Yours
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 36: Blunderball
attributes.caption: Blunderball
attributes.description: Grif and Donut undertake a secret spy mission and Donut overhears Doc/O'Malley making plans.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 37: Dealer Incentive
attributes.caption: Dealer Incentive
attributes.description: Blue Team interrogates Donut then Church possesses him in an attempt to trick Sarge.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles

attributes.title: Episode 38: K.I.T.  B.F.F.
attributes.caption: K.I.T.  B.F.F.
attributes.description: In the final episode of season two, the battle for Blood Gulch moves beyond just Red versus Blue.
attributes.show_title: Red vs. Blue: Blood Gulch Chronicles
